cover_product.name: Crispy Honey-Garlic Chicken
cover_product.description: Our crispiest and juiciest chicken yet! Made from premium NON-GMO pasture-raised chicken and brushed with our delectable honey-garlic glaze, this is something your tastebuds wouldn't want to miss.
